text: "(I'm Gonna) Sing, Sing, Sing" is a hymn written by Hank Williams. He performed it as part of a radio show for Mother's Best Flour in Nashville from January to March 1951. MGM released the song as a posthumous single in 1954 with "Angel of Death" as the B-side. The A-side was recorded as a demo sometime in 1950. == References == ==Source== * Category:1954 singles Category:Hymns Category:Hank Williams songs Category:1951 songs Category:MGM Records singles Category:Songs written by Hank Williams
title: (I'm Gonna) Sing, Sing, Sing
